title: Creates the office of Empire Blue Cross and Blue Shield inspector general
summary: Creates the office of Empire Blue Cross and Blue Shield inspector general in the department of law to investigate the activities of Empire Blue Cross and Blue Shield and prosecute any instances of fraud; delineates powers and duties of such inspector general; requires an annual report; limits disclosure of certain information.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to establishing the office of Empire Blue Cross and Blue Shield inspector general
